verses.name: Genesis 6:20
verses.text: Of fowls after their kind, and of cattle after their kind, of every creeping thing of the earth after his kind, two of every sort shall come unto thee, to keep them alive.

verses.name: Genesis 6:21
verses.text: And take thou unto thee of all food that is eaten, and thou shalt gather it to thee; and it shall be for food for thee, and for them.

verses.name: Genesis 6:22
verses.text: Thus did Noah; according to all that God commanded him, so did he.
